articles.author: Kevin Freking | AP
articles.title: Trump goes out of his way to take a bow, again
articles.description: After researchers reported the largest-ever one-year decline in the U.S. cancer death rate during 2017, President Donald Trump didn't miss the chance to take a bow
articles.content:
While many presidents have acted as the cheerleader-in-chief for the good things that happened on their watch, the cancer tweet showed how the president has taken the art of self-marketing to a whole new level.
From foreign policy initiatives to the choice o… [+4676 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Bus catches fire in road accident in India; at least 20 dead
articles.description: Police say a double-decker bus has caught fire after ramming into a truck on a highway in northern India and 20 people are feared dead
articles.content:
Many of the bodies were burned beyond recognition after the fire swept through the bus, he said.
The accident occurred near Kannauj, a town about 200 kilometers (125 miles) southwest of Lucknow, the state capital.
Police suspect the truck driver lost contro… [+624 chars]

articles.author: Carolyn Hax
articles.title: Carolyn Hax: In-laws’ absence at son’s wedding didn’t make hearts grow fonder
articles.description: Instead of giving them a cold shoulder, tell them that they hurt your feelings.
articles.content:
Now the brothers- and sisters-in-law want to go out for brunch and hear all about the wedding. We are not in the mood to socialize with them. What do we say and do? 
 Insulted
Insulted: Someone needs to tell them youre hurt. Your husband, Id say. Not accusa… [+2242 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: AP Explains: Taiwan's election and its standoff with China
articles.description: Taiwanese are casting their votes Saturday for the president and legislature of a self-governing island that acts like a sovereign nation yet is not recognized by the U.N. or any major country
articles.content:
The election pits President Tsai Ing-wen of the pro-independence Democratic Progressive Party against challenger Han Kuo-yu, a populist mayor from the China-friendly Nationalist Party. A third-party candidate, James Soong, is also running.
WHAT IS TAIWAN?
T… [+2966 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: 7 countries lose vote in UN General Assembly over arrears
articles.description: The United Nations says seven countries are so far behind in paying their dues that they are losing their voting privileges in the 193-member General Assembly, including Venezuela and Lebanon
articles.content:
He said the other countries that are losing their vote are Central African Republic, Gambia, Lesotho, Tonga and Yemen.
An estimated 4.5 million people have fled Venezuela since 2015, escaping hyperinflation, failing services, a lack of security and political… [+549 chars]

articles.author: Edith M. Lederer | AP
articles.title: Russia scores victory for ally Syria in UN vote cutting aid
articles.description: Russia has scored a victory for its close ally Syria
articles.content:
U.S. Ambassador Kelly Craft accused Russia of triumphantly supporting Syrian President Bashar Assads goveernment to starve its opposition. And she warned: Syrians will suffer needlessly ... (and) Syrians will die as a result of this resolution.
The resolutio… [+5693 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Iran state TV, citing military, says country 'unintentionally' shot down Ukrainian jetliner because of human error
articles.description: Iran state TV, citing military, says country 'unintentionally' shot down Ukrainian jetliner because of human error
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran Iran state TV, citing military, says country unintentionally shot down Ukrainian jetliner because of human error.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: China reports 1st death from new type of coronavirus
articles.description: Health authorities in the central Chinese city of Wuhan are reporting the first death from a new type of coronavirus
articles.content: The patient who died was identified as a 61-year-old man who had been admitted after suffering shortness of breath and severe pneumonia. The commission said he also suffered from abdominal tumors and chronic liver disease and had been a frequent customer at a… [+880 chars]
